评论详情: Absolutely darling!

I bought this for my grand daughter. Very very soft. Washed and dried well. The head band was to big but everything else was true to size. I would say it is a medium weight fabric. So soft. The color was just like the photo.
Nice quality and very unique
Super cute and soft. Perfect
Cute outfit but Amazon shipped the wrong size. Twice. In the same week. I give up.
cute and comfy!
Absolutely adorable outfit fast shipping used for a baby shower and it was the head of the party.
Fits true to size and looks great
Sizing is accurate. This set is super soft. Very much like a soft cotton sweater material. It’ll be great for winter and Christmas.
This is a nice warm outfit it’s perfect for the cold weather it’s cute and almost vintage style it’s got great stretch and fits as expected! Thicker material

What I like about the Newborn Romper outfit is that it fits a little big so it's not too tight on the baby. The material used is soft and very comfortable for her to wear. I also like the little wrinkle effect of the clothing I believe it makes it look a little vintage.
This was a gift for the newest member of my big family!! The mom loved it. I thought it was constructed well, and the color is gorgeous. I can't wait to see our little sweetheart wearing it.

评论概述: Cozy cute and perfect for fall
评论详情: This set is so cute for your little one! The mauveish color is very pretty and understated and a nice change of pace from many baby clothes that are so bright and colorful. The material is fairly soft and it seems well stitched. Recommend!
I ordered 3-6 months but received 12-18 months. It's quite big but very cute! The material is thick and soft. The outfit is trendy and comfortable.

This outfit is super cute, & very well made! The material is great and thick for colder weather, the sizing is perfect and is true to size. I love all of the different colors as well! This is great to just throw on your baby and have a cute outfit at the same time! I love it and want every color!!
I’m reviewing a size 0-3 months. The quality is very good! The outfit in itself is very cute. The size & fit is perfect. I’m very pleased with it

评论概述: Stylish and Comfy clothing set for toddlers
评论详情: My cousin brother recently had a baby girl and I was looking to gift a clothing set which is stylish and comfy. This romper top and bell bottom pant set is really adorable and fits perfectly to my choice.  The flair design on the top and pant is trendy and lovely. The bow design and headband are quite cute.  The fabric is soft, breathable and comfy. The material is thick, making it perfect for fall and winter season.  The outfit is true to the size, having enough stretch for unrestricted body movements. My niece is quite comfortable in it.  Overall, if you are looking for a cozy, comfy and fashionable outfit for infants and toddlers, this is the set to pick. Would recommend it.
This is a really cute outfit and the fabric is really nice and cozy. Runs big. I would recommend sizing down.
I really love this set. It's beautiful, well made, fits as expected and with a beautiful color. 100% love this.

评论概述: Adorable and Cozy Outfit for Little Ones
评论详情: This SUNNY PIGGY romper and pant set is just adorable and has quickly become a favorite in our little one's wardrobe. The design is charming, with cute flare details on both the legs and arms that add a lovely touch of style. The fabric is impressively soft and feels comfortable against the skin, making it perfect for fall and winter wear.  One of the standout features is the quality of the material. It’s made from a thick, stretchy fabric that not only feels durable but also provides warmth, which is ideal for cooler weather. The outfit fits true to size, ensuring a snug yet comfortable fit that doesn't restrict movement, which is essential for active infants and toddlers.  The romper’s overall look is stylish enough for special outings yet practical enough for everyday wear. It’s easy to put on and take off, which is always a plus when dealing with little ones. The set is versatile and pairs well with other accessories, making it easy to mix and match with other pieces in the wardrobe.  If you’re looking for a cute, comfortable, and well-made outfit for your baby girl, this set is a fantastic choice. It combines style and comfort beautifully, making it a great addition for any season.
This is a pretty set outfit. It is soft and well sewn. Can be worn two ways.  Nice color and as pictured.
This is such a super cute set. Heavyweight. Washed up nicely & fits true to size.

评论概述: So stinkin' cute!  Can't wait to gift this to my cousin!
评论详情: This outfit is adorable.  My cousin just found out that they are pregnant with a little princess, and lavender is her favorite color.  This outfit will be gifted to her at her baby shower.  It is seriously cute!  The pants have that cute flair shape, and the headband is everything!  I know that she will love it.  And, it is so soft for baby!
Love love love this adorable outfit! It is so cute on! It does run slightly large until wash and dried after laundering it fits great! Totally recommend!

This outfit is adorable and I was looking forward to my little one wearing it. Unfortunately while I ordered a 6-12 I received a 12-18. It is made out of a nice thick material, that feels soft and stretchy. I’m excited for when she finally can wear it.

Can’t wait for my daughter to wear this. It’s a lovely romper pants set. The design is adorable.  My wife like the flare design on the legs and arms. The fabric is soft and comfy perfect for fall or winter outfit. This will keep my baby warm. Worth the price.
Very Girly! Not a fan of the white snaps but its adorable. The color is a soft pink, unlike my photo.
The bell bottom cuffs and pants are very trendy.  Baby will be a fashionista for sure!  Versatile, mix and match clothing you already have, making this a smart choice!
Everyone loved this outfit. I got so many compliments and questions on where I got it from. Washed well and is soft.
This is absolutely adorable! I can’t wait to put it on my niece! What an adorable style and set!

I love this outfit for our grand-daughter. It is very nice quality and well made garment.  The bow is a very cute addition to the two pieces.  The color is a very nice muted brownish color that blends nice with her complexion.  Super happy with this outfit since it is washable and drives pretty quick.  I like to have extra clothes for her when she's here just in case.  She looks adorable in this outfit too! Nice product for the prices. Super happy with it!

Gorgeous 3 piece girls outfit comes with long sleeves onesie with bell arms and a bow and snaps in the crotch. Long pants with flared legs and a matching hair band! The outfit itself is very thick and soft and very well made perfect for fall as winter weather! Easy to wash! Super cute gift!

This purple cute fashion for baby is great for fall and winter seasons . It's thick durable material looks good as well it can keep baby warm.  Can't comment on comfort because the wrong size was sent. Total disappointment. Ordered 12-18 months they sent 6-12mths!  Limited stretch so make sure you buy right size..  4 stars for sending wrong size!

I think this is one of the cutest baby outfits I've seen. Any baby girl will look adorable in this set. The material is great. The outfit looks expensive. It is soft and well made. It's a little on the heavier side so I'd recommend for cooler weather. The outfit is cute and sassy. Very trendy. I highly recommend.
This outfit is so cute and detailed. It's so soft and well made. It fits perfectly
